CURRENT REQUIREMENTS


The current requirements include:
Process Safety Advisory – (n2 to Paulo)
Process Safety Consultant

Process Safety Advisory  (Manager) 
This is a new role and the exact profile has not been fully scoped out – but in gist this is for someone to act as the key interface between Paulo and the team and help him drive the consultancy forward in terms of success. The role will help him function effectively in the mentoring of the existing team and fill the skill gap in the te...
